title: Erigon loops on [Snapshots] download step even though it shows 100%
body:
#### System information

Erigon version: `./erigon --version`
erigon version 2022.99.99-dev-6e18bef6

OS & Version: Windows/Linux/OSX
Linux

Commit hash : 
6e18bef60ae12b633b472969d1fe3adf58d0127d

#### Expected behaviour

Erigon progresses past Snapshots download.

#### Actual behaviour
Loops on 100% progress and doesn't advance

#### Steps to reproduce the behaviour
Run the following:
./build/bin/erigon --datadir=/mnt/blocks/ --downloader.verify

#### Backtrace

````
INFO[08-17|16:16:49.874] [txpool] stat                            block=0 pending=19 baseFee=0 queued=120 alloc=2.4GB sys=3.2GB
INFO[08-17|16:16:49.886] [Snapshots] download                     progress="100.00% 226.2GB/226.2GB" download=102.4KB/s upload=0B/s peers=1 connections=1 files=90 alloc=2.4GB sys=3.2GB
INFO[08-17|16:17:09.886] [Snapshots] download                     progress="100.00% 226.2GB/226.2GB" download=0B/s upload=0B/s peers=1 connections=1 files=90 alloc=2.5GB sys=3.2GB
INFO[08-17|16:17:29.886] [Snapshots] download                     progress="100.00% 226.2GB/226.2GB" download=102.4KB/s upload=0B/s peers=2 connections=2 files=90 alloc=2.6GB sys=3.2GB
INFO[08-17|16:17:49.861] [p2p] GoodPeers                          eth66=33
INFO[08-17|16:17:49.874] [txpool] stat                            block=0 pending=19 baseFee=0 queued=120 alloc=2.7GB sys=3.2GB
INFO[08-17|16:17:49.886] [Snapshots] download                     progress="100.00% 226.2GB/226.2GB" download=0B/s upload=0B/s peers=2 connections=2 files=90 alloc=2.7GB sys=3.2GB
INFO[08-17|16:18:09.886] [Snapshots] download                     progress="100.00% 226.2GB/226.2GB" download=0B/s upload=0B/s peers=2 connections=2 files=90 alloc=2.2GB sys=3.2GB
INFO[08-17|16:18:29.886] [Snapshots] download                     progress="100.00% 226.2GB/226.2GB" download=102.4KB/s upload=0B/s peers=1 connections=1 files=90 alloc=2.3GB sys=3.2GB
INFO[08-17|16:18:49.873] [txpool] stat                            block=0 pending=19 baseFee=0 queued=120 alloc=2.4GB sys=3.2GB
INFO[08-17|16:18:49.886] [Snapshots] download                     progress="100.00% 226.2GB/226.2GB" download=102.4KB/s upload=0B/s peers=2 connections=2 files=90 alloc=2.4GB sys=3.2GB
INFO[08-17|16:19:09.886] [Snapshots] download                     progress="100.00% 226.2GB/226.2GB" download=102.4KB/s upload=0B/s peers=2 connections=2 files=90 alloc=2.5GB sys=3.2GB
INFO[08-17|16:19:29.886] [Snapshots] download                     progress="100.00% 226.2GB/226.2GB" download=204.8KB/s upload=0B/s peers=1 connections=1 files=90 alloc=2.6GB sys=3.2GB
INFO[08-17|16:19:49.861] [p2p] GoodPeers                          eth66=33
INFO[08-17|16:19:49.873] [txpool] stat                            block=0 pending=19 baseFee=0 queued=120 alloc=2.7GB sys=3.2GB
INFO[08-17|16:19:49.886] [Snapshots] download                     progress="100.00% 226.2GB/226.2GB" download=0B/s upload=0B/s peers=2 connections=2 files=90 alloc=2.7GB sys=3.2GB
INFO[08-17|16:20:09.886] [Snapshots] download                     progress="100.00% 226.2GB/226.2GB" download=102.4KB/s upload=0B/s peers=1 connections=1 files=90 alloc=2.2GB sys=3.2GB
INFO[08-17|16:20:29.886] [Snapshots] download                     progress="100.00% 226.2GB/226.2GB" download=0B/s upload=0B/s peers=1 connections=1 files=90 alloc=2.3GB sys=3.2GB
INFO[08-17|16:20:49.874] [txpool] stat                            block=0 pending=19 baseFee=0 queued=120 alloc=2.3GB sys=3.2GB
INFO[08-17|16:20:49.886] [Snapshots] download                     progress="100.00% 226.2GB/226.2GB" download=0B/s upload=0B/s peers=1 connections=1 files=90 alloc=2.3GB sys=3.2GB
INFO[08-17|16:21:09.886] [Snapshots] download                     progress="100.00% 226.2GB/226.2GB" download=102.4KB/s upload=0B/s peers=1 connections=1 files=90 alloc=2.4GB sys=3.2GB
````

please add --metrics flag, start erigon wait when it gets to 100% point.
then show us: `http://localhost:6060/debug/vars` then 
then wait 5 min and show us again: `http://localhost:6060/debug/vars`

Vars:
